Norwegian Language

This video is a very good video about expressions in the Norwegian Language. It covers basic phrases which are common in everyday conversations.

But how to speak Norwegian properly? This is a good question for people who are looking for a good pronunciation in Norwegian. First of all it is useful to watch Norwegian films or series. Here one can listen to the phrases from actors in the scenes. Of course the radio is a great source for improving listening skills as well. The different useful and interesting expressions of topic today are the following:

  • På grunn av
  • Å stå opp
  • Å ta på seg
1. På grunn av dårlig vær så måtte Kjell bli hjemme, han ventet på å kunne dra på skolen.
2. Siden Jens sto opp kl. 12:00 i dag så kom han for sent til jobb og fikk sparken!
3. Katrine tok på seg skjorta og dro på festen sammen med venninnene hennes. Hun gledet seg.

For all the latter examples the expressions are very common and useful in everyday language. If you are eager to learn more expressions and speak natural Norwegian then you can book a lesson here anytime! We are always here to help you out, and hopefully we can get your Norwegian skills improved :)
Vi snakkes!

Let's start!
